message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $20,000. I believe it offers excellent value at this price point, even though I know we haven't reached your ideal number yet. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget. Can you meet me at this price?

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $10,000 is significantly below its value.  I could consider $17,000, which is a considerable compromise on my end. This offer reflects the product's true worth.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $17,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $13,000. Can you consider this price?
